jcurses.event
类 Event

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.event.Event
直接已知子类：
ActionEvent, ItemEvent, ValueChangedEvent, WindowEvent
public class Event
extends java.lang.Object

This is the basic class for all events, that are generated by jcurses widgets.

构造方法摘要
Event(Widget source)
          The constructor
 
方法摘要
 Widget getSource()
          The method returns the widget, that has generated this event
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

Event

public Event(Widget source)
The constructor

参数：
source - the widgets, that has generated this event
方法详细信息

getSource

public Widget getSource()
The method returns the widget, that has generated this event

返回：
the widget, that has generated this event
